data.actual_result: Bottom bar overlaps the bottom permission option
data.expected_result: Bottom bar should not overlap any options on screen
data.short_description: [iPhone X/XS/XS Max] Bottom bar overlaps permission option
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Server Settings - Tap 'Roles', and then any role - Tap 'General Permissions' - Scroll down to the bottom - Observe the bar at the bottom
